Description.Text: If you are planning for a particular holiday destination at Costa del Sol, then Aparturis Toboso Hotel Nerja is the perfect place for you to reside and explore the surroundings. During leisure, guests can relax at the refreshing sauna, solarium or take a dip at the energizing swimming pool. Toboso is located close to the beach in the western part of Nerja. There are a number of restaurants and bars that are close by and you are only a few minutes walk to the centre of Nerja.The hotel provides amenities like airport transfer, baby sitting service, banquet facilities, bar, conference facilities, doctor on call, dry cleaning, gym, laundry service, lift/elevator, lobby, night club, parking facilities-at cost, reception, restaurant, safe deposit box, solarium, swimming pool-indoor and swimming pool outdoor.

Toboso is located close to the beach in the western part of Nerja. There are a number of restaurants and bars that are close by and you are only a few minutes walk to the centre of Nerja A taxi transfer from Malaga Airport to Hotel it's 70 Â€ .

Studio - Room with one twin bed or one double bed and a sofa bed includes air conditioning, bathroom amenities, cable/ satellite TV, color TV, crockery/ cutlery, ensuite, private bathroom, hairdryer, heating, iron/ ironing board, kettle, kitchenette, laundry service, microwave oven, refrigerator, safe in room, tea and coffee making facilities, telephone and toaster.
Studio Sea View - Room with one twin bed or one double bed and a sofa bed includes air conditioning, balcony / terrace, bathroom amenities, cable/ satellite TV, color TV, crockery/ cutlery, ensuite, private bathroom, hairdryer, heating, iron/ ironing board, kettle, kitchenette, laundry service, microwave oven, refrigerator, safe in room, tea and coffee making facilities, telephone and toaster.
Apartment - Room with one twin bed or one double bed and a sofa bed includes air conditioning, bathroom amenities, cable/ satellite TV, color TV, crockery/ cutlery, ensuite, private bathroom, hairdryer, heating, iron/ ironing board, kettle, kitchenette, laundry service, microwave oven, refrigerator, safe in room, tea and coffee making facilities, telephone and toaster.
